titles.title: A bill to amend title 18, United States Code, to punish persons who transfer blood knowing it is infected with the virus for acquired immune difficiency syndrome.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Criminal Justice.

bill.summary: 10/1/1987--Introduced. Amends the Federal criminal code to make it a criminal offense to transfer blood for use in humans knowing that such blood is infected with the acquired immune deficiency syndrome (AIDS) virus.
